customer_reviews.title: This sofa looks nice and I really like the fllip up/down function for ...
customer_reviews.text: This sofa looks nice and I really like the fllip up/down function for storage and bed. The overall design is great. Should be really easy to install.(less than half hour) However, they really need to improve their quality control process. The package I received came with wrong size screw nuts!!! It took me a while to find out that the installation fasteners were stardand M8-1.25 metric size and the nuts were 5/16-18 inch thread size. Really dispointed when I found out I have to stop the installation process and get the M8 nut at a local fastener store. Moreover, the hinge looks weak, will see if it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: The couch is comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.text: My couch arrived ahead of my scheduled appointment, which was a surprise. Luckily I was home to receive it. The couch is comfortable for the price. The storage is good. I have not tried the reclining sleeper feature yet. I'm giving this couch a 2 star review because it never came with instructions to put it together. It just came with the bolts and tools. I'm currently trying to contact Poundex Customer Service to see if they can email me the instructions for the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Koester

customer_reviews.title: this couch is awesome. It arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by negative reviews, this couch is awesome. It arrived quickly, super easy to assemble, it is beautiful, not insanely huge and sturdy, exactly what I needed. It has tons of storage and it looks gorgeous. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lovehumanrace

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sofa for almost 2 years now. It looks great and has a ton of storage. It's fairly easy to lift up or fold down into a bed. A couple of my friends that were helping me move assembled it and it took them about 30-40 minutes and seemed pretty easy. The one huge con is that it is extremely uncomfortable. The little padding it has is already worn down and you can feel every piece of the wood frame. I've never sat on such an uncomfortable piece of furniture. I've learned my lesson and I will never buy furniture without testing it out first.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Love to hate this couch
customer_reviews.text: So, you definitely get what you pay for. It's not super comfortable. It's not built to last. BUT . . . it's exactly what we needed. The functionality makes up for the lack of a super relaxing sofa. It's worth the $325 that I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolt45

customer_reviews.title: The holes on the seat don't match with holes on the leg.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. The storage is nice and big. It comes with the instructions and all the parts needed. Easy to assemble. One of the legs doesn't fit in all three screws. The holes on the seat don't match with holes on the leg. Attached it with just the middle screw for now. Please provide me a solution.
